# Main use
After loading the package, the main methods are `load_dataset()`, 

```{r setup, warning = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(SCORER)
```

# Specific functions

# Shiny application
The Shiny application can be launched with `run_app()` and the dataset to be analyzed can be supplied with the dataset parameter. The dataset must be loaded with the `load_dataset()` function.
